product_name: National Geographic Trails Illustrated Allegheny North Trail Map - Allegheny National Forest
long_description: The National Geographic Trails Illustrated Allegheny North trail map offers clear, detailed coverage of the northern part of the Allegheny National Forest in Pennsylvania and New York.
short_description: The National Geographic Trails Illustrated Allegheny North trail map offers clear, detailed coverage of the northern part of the Allegheny National Forest in Pennsylvania and New York.
